resources.string: Enter a name for this game:

The Game: Each player earns points during the time they are IT. Your job is to stay away from the person that is IT and try to be as close to everyone else when you are IT. \n Step 1: Click your context menu and select the color you want to be in the top drop down menu. Each person playing should have their own color. Then check the boxes of the colors playing with you, including your own color. Click "Save." \n Step 2: Press back and then once everyone is ready to start press "Play Game" at the same time.
You will now need to wait for players to join. The game will begin at the time on the next screen. Press OK to begin waiting for players.
Wait For Games to be Found
Click the Game You Want To Play
Please wait for players to join

Each game will last 2 minutes long. Once the game begins it will display the name of whoever is \"IT\" and your current score. Your goal is to try to stay away from the person who is \"IT\". If you are \"IT\" your goal is to try and stay as close to as many other players as possible. Everyone will have their turn to be \"IT\" so be ready to run. The phone will vibrate when a different person is \"IT\" and tell you if you are \"IT.\" \n
You can only gain points during the time you are \"IT.\" You receive points for every player you are close to.
